metadata.title: LDAP Server Should Require Protected Binds
metadata.description: If installed, LDAP server should require secure binds.

criteria.comment: If installed, LDAP server should be configured to use strong encryption

extend_definition.comment: openldap server should only be present if it fulfills an operational requirement

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the ^[\s]*olcSecurity[\s]*:[\s]*.*simple_bind=128.* expression in the /etc/openldap/slapd.d/cn=config/olcDatabase*bdb.ldif file
